response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly impact and benefit your business operations. This product, designed with cutting-edge technology and innovation, offers unparalleled efficiency and cost savings. Given its unique features and market value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. I trust this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns on your expenditure. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how we can collaborate.", "product_price": 850000}
